name: MatchStrike
description:
My submission for the 2019 LOVE Game Jam made across 3 days. Uses LOVE 0.10.2

Run around and light all the matches as fast as possible!

Controls:
  • Z/O - Accept
  • X/P - Back
  • R - Retry
  • ESC - Quit/Main Menu
  • M - Mute Music

Special thanks to @monplaisir for the jolly music loop
